title: Coffee is now a symbol of Germany's immigration debate
text:
Coffee is now a symbol of Germany's immigration debate 9:47pm IST - 01:48 
Syrians who fled the civil war into Germany have been outraged by a far-right politician's photograph of himself drinking coffee in a Syrian city, claiming it was safe enough to deport the migrants.   
Syrians who fled the civil war into Germany have been outraged by a far-right politician's photograph of himself drinking coffee in a Syrian city, claiming it was safe enough to deport the migrants.  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/03/16/coffee-is-now-a-symbol-of-germanys-immig?videoId=409517338&videoChannel=13423
